name: react-carousel-scroller-docs
description: GitHub Page for React Carousel Scroller
author: Oliver Sartun

scripts.compile-scroller: cd .. && npm run compile && cd docs
scripts.copy-scroller: cd .. && mkdir -p docs/js/src && cp ./*scroller.js docs/js/src && cd docs
scripts.build: npm run compile-scroller && npm run copy-scroller && npm run bundle
